text: José de Anchieta Júnior (11 March 1965 - 6 December 2018) was a Brazilian politician. He was born in Jaguaribe, Ceará. Anchieta Júnior was a member of the Brazilian Social Democracy Party (PSDB). He was the Governor of the northern Brazilian state of Roraima from December 2007 to April 2014. Anchieta Júnior died of a heart attack on 6 December 2018 in Boa Vista, Roraima, aged 53. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Roraima Category:Brazilian politicians
title: José de Anchieta Júnior
